mapper.sql: ACTIVECLASS_CODE, PROJECT_ID, ACTIVECLASS_NAME, HELP_CODE, REMARK, STATE
IMORDER_NO, PROJECT_ID, ACTIVECLASS_CODE, LCC_CODE, USER_CODE, USER_NAME, CREATE_DATE, CREATE_BY, IS_REMOVED, STOCK_CODE, SUPPLIER_CODE, IMPORT_STATE

insert into PIP_MMS_DEVIMPORT_MASTER
IMORDER_NO,
PROJECT_ID,
ACTIVECLASS_CODE,
LCC_CODE,
USER_CODE,
USER_NAME,

mapper.update:
update PIP_MMS_DEVIMPORT_MASTER
ACTIVECLASS_CODE = #{activeclassCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LCC_CODE = #{lccCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
USER_CODE = #{userCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
USER_NAME = #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATE_DATE = #{createDate,jdbcType=DATE},
CREATE_BY = #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
IS_REMOVED = #{isRemoved,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
STOCK_CODE = #{stockCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SUPPLIER_CODE = #{supplierCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
IMPORT_STATE = #{importState,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
where IMORDER_NO = #{imorderNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and PROJECT_ID = #{projectId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.insert:
insert into PIP_MMS_DEVIMPORT_DETAIL
ID,
PROJECT_ID,
IMORDER_NO,
MATERLINFO_CODE,
MATERL_BATCH,
MATERL_PRICE,
WHOLESALE_PRICE,
IMPORT_AMOUNT,
STORE_UNIT,
PERIOD_VALIDITY,
SUPPLIER_CODE,
CREATE_DATE,
CREATE_BY,
ASSETS_STATUS,
IS_MEASURE,
NEXT_MEASURE_DATE,
MEASURE_PERIOD,
ARCHIVES_NO,
MAD_SEQUENCE.NEXTVAL,
#{projectId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{imorderNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{materlinfoCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{materlBatch,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{materlPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{wholesalePrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{importAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{storeUnit,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{periodValidity,jdbcType=DATE},
#{supplierCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{createDate,jdbcType=DATE},
#{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{assetsStatus,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{isMeasure,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{nextMeasureDate,jdbcType=DATE},
#{measurePeriod,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{archivesNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mapper.update: update PIP_MMS_DEVIMPORT_DETAIL set PROJECT_ID = #{projectId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IMORDER_NO = #{imorderNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MATERLINFO_CODE = #{materlinfoCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MATERL_BATCH = #{materlBatch,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MATERL_PRICE = #{materlPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, WHOLESALE_PRICE = #{wholesalePrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, IMPORT_AMOUNT = #{importAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, STORE_UNIT = #{storeUnit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PERIOD_VALIDITY = #{periodValidity,jdbcType=DATE}, SUPPLIER_CODE = #{supplierCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_DATE = #{createDate,jdbcType=DATE}, CREATE_BY = #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ASSETS_STATUS = #{assetsStatus,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, IS_MEASURE = #{isMeasure,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, NEXT_MEASURE_DATE = #{nextMeasureDate,jdbcType=DATE}, MEASURE_PERIOD = #{measurePeriod,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, ARCHIVES_NO = #{archivesNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
mapper.delete: delete from PIP_MMS_DEVIMPORT_DETAIL PD where PD.IMORDER_NO=#{imorderNo} and PD.PROJECT_ID=#{projectId}
mapper.select:
select PS.*, PM.MATERL_NAME materlName, pms.supplier_name, PM.HELP_CODE helpCode from PIP_MMS_DEVSTORE PS left join PIP_MMS_MATERL_INFO PM ON PS.MATERLINFO_CODE=PM.MATERLINFO_CODE left join pip_mms_supplier pms on pms.SUPPLIER_CODE = ps.SUPPLIER_CODE where 1=1
and PS.STOCK_CODE=#{stockCode}
and PS.STORE_AMOUNT>0
and PS.ARCHIVES_NO=#{archivesNo} order by ps.ARCHIVES_NO desc

insert into PIP_MMS_DEVSTORE
ID,
PROJECT_ID,
LCC_CODE,
STOCK_CODE,
MATERLINFO_CODE,
MATERL_BATCH,
MATERL_PRICE,
WHOLESALE_PRICE,
STORE_AMOUNT,
STORE_UNIT,
PERIOD_VALIDITY,
SUPPLIER_CODE,
CREATE_DATE,
CREATE_BY,
PRODUCE_DATE,
MATERL_SPEC,
ASSETS_STATUS,
IS_MEASURE,
NEXT_MEASURE_DATE,
MEASURE_PERIOD,
ARCHIVES_NO,
PIP_MMS_DEVSTORE_SEQUENCE.NEXTVAL,
#{projectId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{lccCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{stockCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{materlinfoCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{materlBatch,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{materlPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{wholesalePrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{storeAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{storeUnit,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{periodValidity,jdbcType=DATE},
#{supplierCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{createDate,jdbcType=DATE},
#{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{produceDate,jdbcType=DATE},
#{materlSpec,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{assetsStatus,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{isMeasure,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{nextMeasureDate,jdbcType=DATE},
#{measurePeriod,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{archivesNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mapper.update:
update PIP_MMS_DEVSTORE
PROJECT_ID = #{projectId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LCC_CODE = #{lccCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STOCK_CODE = #{stockCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MATERLINFO_CODE = #{materlinfoCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MATERL_BATCH = #{materlBatch,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MATERL_PRICE = #{materlPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
WHOLESALE_PRICE = #{wholesalePrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
STORE_AMOUNT = #{storeAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
STORE_UNIT = #{storeUnit,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PERIOD_VALIDITY = #{periodValidity,jdbcType=DATE},
SUPPLIER_CODE = #{supplierCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATE_DATE = #{createDate,jdbcType=DATE},
CREATE_BY = #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PRODUCE_DATE = #{produceDate,jdbcType=DATE},
MATERL_SPEC = #{materlSpec,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ASSETS_STATUS = #{assetsStatus,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
IS_MEASURE = #{isMeasure,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
NEXT_MEASURE_DATE = #{nextMeasureDate,jdbcType=DATE},
MEASURE_PERIOD = #{measurePeriod,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
ARCHIVES_NO = #{archivesNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where 1=1 and PROJECT_ID=#{projectId} and ARCHIVES_NO=#{archivesNo} and ID =#{id}
mapper.delete: delete from PIP_MMS_DEVSTORE P where P.ID=#{id}
mapper.select: select PM.* from PIP_MMS_DEVEXPORT_MASTER PM where PM.EXORDER_NO=#{exorderNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select PM.*, PT.ACTIVECLASS_NAME activeclassName, PS.SUPPLIER_NAME supplierName, PCI.LCC_NAME exportLccName, PC.LCC_NAME lccName, MS.STOCK_NAME stockName, MSS.STOCK_NAME exportStockName from PIP_MMS_DEVEXPORT_MASTER PM LEFT JOIN PIP_MMS_ACTIVE_TYPE PT ON PM.ACTIVECLASS_CODE = PT.ACTIVECLASS_CODE LEFT JOIN PIP_MMS_SUPPLIER PS ON PM.SUPPLIER_CODE = PS.SUPPLIER_CODE LEFT JOIN PIP_MMS_STOREHOUSE MS ON PM.STOCK_CODE = MS.STOCK_CODE AND PM.PROJECT_ID = MS.PROJECT_ID LEFT JOIN PIP_MMS_STOREHOUSE MSS ON PM.EXPORT_STOCK_CODE = MSS.STOCK_CODE AND PM.PROJECT_ID = MSS.PROJECT_ID LEFT JOIN PIP_COMM_LCC PC ON PM.LCC_CODE = PC.LCC_CODE AND PM.PROJECT_ID = PC.PROJECT_ID LEFT JOIN PIP_COMM_LCC PCI ON PM.EXPORT_LCC_CODE = PCI.LCC_CODE AND PM.PROJECT_ID = PCI.PROJECT_ID where 1 = 1
and PM.EXORDER_NO in (${exportNos})

select PM.*, PT.ACTIVECLASS_NAME activeclassName, PS.SUPPLIER_NAME supplierName, PCI.LCC_NAME exportLccName, PC.LCC_NAME lccName, MS.STOCK_NAME stockName, MSS.STOCK_NAME exportStockName from PIP_MMS_DEVEXPORT_MASTER PM LEFT JOIN PIP_MMS_ACTIVE_TYPE PT ON PM.ACTIVECLASS_CODE=PT.ACTIVECLASS_CODE LEFT JOIN PIP_MMS_SUPPLIER PS ON PM.SUPPLIER_CODE=PS.SUPPLIER_CODE LEFT JOIN PIP_MMS_STOREHOUSE MS ON PM.STOCK_CODE=MS.STOCK_CODE AND PM.PROJECT_ID=MS.PROJECT_ID LEFT JOIN PIP_MMS_STOREHOUSE MSS ON PM.EXPORT_STOCK_CODE=MSS.STOCK_CODE AND PM.PROJECT_ID=MSS.PROJECT_ID LEFT JOIN PIP_COMM_LCC PC ON PM.LCC_CODE=PC.LCC_CODE AND PM.PROJECT_ID=PC.PROJECT_ID LEFT JOIN PIP_COMM_LCC PCI ON PM.EXPORT_LCC_CODE=PCI.LCC_CODE AND PM.PROJECT_ID=PCI.PROJECT_ID where 1=1
and PM.EXORDER_NO = #{exorderNo}

select PM.*, PT.ACTIVECLASS_NAME activeclassName, PS.SUPPLIER_NAME supplierName, PCI.LCC_NAME exportLccName, PC.LCC_NAME lccName, MS.STOCK_NAME stockName, MSS.STOCK_NAME exportStockName from PIP_MMS_DEVEXPORT_MASTER PM LEFT JOIN PIP_MMS_ACTIVE_TYPE PT ON PM.ACTIVECLASS_CODE=PT.ACTIVECLASS_CODE LEFT JOIN PIP_MMS_SUPPLIER PS ON PM.SUPPLIER_CODE=PS.SUPPLIER_CODE LEFT JOIN PIP_MMS_STOREHOUSE MS ON PM.STOCK_CODE=MS.STOCK_CODE AND PM.PROJECT_ID=MS.PROJECT_ID LEFT JOIN PIP_MMS_STOREHOUSE MSS ON PM.EXPORT_STOCK_CODE=MSS.STOCK_CODE AND PM.PROJECT_ID=MSS.PROJECT_ID LEFT JOIN PIP_COMM_LCC PC ON PM.LCC_CODE=PC.LCC_CODE AND PM.PROJECT_ID=PC.PROJECT_ID LEFT JOIN PIP_COMM_LCC PCI ON PM.EXPORT_LCC_CODE=PCI.LCC_CODE AND PM.PROJECT_ID=PCI.PROJECT_ID where 1=1 and PM.IS_REMOVED=0 and pm.lcc_code in (select lcc_code from pip_sys_user_data_limit lt where lt.user_id = #{userId})
and PM.EXORDER_NO like '%${exorderNo}%'
and PCI.LCC_NAME like '%${exportLccName}%'
and to_char(PM.EXPORT_DATE,'yyyy-MM-dd') >= '${exportStartDate}'
and to_char(PM.EXPORT_DATE,'yyyy-MM-dd') <= '${exportEndDate}'
and to_char(PM.CREATE_DATE,'yyyy-MM-dd') >= '${orderStartDate}'
and to_char(PM.CREATE_DATE,'yyyy-MM-dd') <= '${orderEndDate}'
and PM.EXORDER_NO in (select distinct exorder_no from pip_mms_devexport_detail where archives_no like'%${archivesNo}%' )
and PM.PROJECT_ID = #{projectId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
and MS.STOCK_NAME like '%${stockName}%'
order by PM.${sidx} ${sord}
mapper.insert:
insert into PIP_MMS_DEVEXPORT_MASTER
EXORDER_NO,
PROJECT_ID,
ACTIVECLASS_CODE,
LCC_CODE,
USER_CODE,
USER_NAME,
CREATE_DATE,
CREATE_BY,
IS_REMOVED,
STOCK_CODE,
EXPORT_STOCK_CODE,
SUPPLIER_CODE,
EXPORT_DATE,
EXPORT_LCC_CODE,

#{exportLccCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mapper.update:
update PIP_MMS_DEVEXPORT_MASTER
ACTIVECLASS_CODE = #{activeclassCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LCC_CODE = #{lccCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
USER_CODE = #{userCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
USER_NAME = #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATE_DATE = #{createDate,jdbcType=DATE},
CREATE_BY = #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
IS_REMOVED = #{isRemoved,jdbcType=DECIMAL},

EXPORT_STOCK_CODE = #{exportStockCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SUPPLIER_CODE = #{supplierCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
EXPORT_DATE = #{exportDate,jdbcType=DATE},
EXPORT_LCC_CODE = #{exportLccCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where EXORDER_NO = #{exorderNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and PROJECT_ID = #{projectId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

EXORDER_NO = #{exorderNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MATERLINFO_CODE = #{materlinfoCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MATERL_BATCH = #{materlBatch,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

where ID = #{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
